name: Subway Spooky Penguin
description:
Subway Spooky Penguin is an awesome infinity running game.
A Penguin play in a subway with her bicycle.
You must help her to run to escape chase of a monster.
Don't forget to dodge all obstacles in the way.
Cycle as fast as possible.

Subway Spooky Penguin runner game
Rush as fast as you can dodge the oncoming obstacles
Save your loved beautiful Penguin , run in the snow subway, what are you waiting for?
if you are a good runner, this is the best place for you.
The most excited subway snow themed runner game, escape from the Santa Claus, run as fast as you can. Intuitive controls to run left or right, jump in the sky to obtain more coins, excited slide to safety!

Protect your beautiful Penguin , join the best runner game!


**** Game Features ****
- Smooth graphics
- Easy one-touch controls and gameplay
- Rich background music and sound effects
- Intense and exciting game rhythm
- Explore the mysterious terrain! ! !
- Face the unknown dangers and fear! ! !
-Snow subway themed game
-Best Penguin runner
